text: læa phwk khea di hı mi swn hnung sahrab xallxhˌ sung sing thi phraxngkh di bangkeid khun xan dikæ phuch læa psusatw doythi phwk khea klaw wa ni sahrab xallxhˌ tam kar xang khxng phwk khea læa ni sahrab brrda phakhi khxng phwk rea læw swn thi pen khxng brrda phakhi hæng phwk khea nan k ca mi thung xallxhˌ tæ swn thi pen khx ngxallxhˌ nan ca thung brrda phakhi khxng phwk khea chang chawcha thæ «sing thi phwk khea tadsin kan
